title: Mahabage Kurunduwatta Road Valuable Land
details:
A Valuable land in Kurunduwatta Road Highly Residential area. ONLY LAND AVAILABLE FOR SALE IN THIS AREA AT THIS PRICE..!!!
400M to Negombo-Colombo Main Road (See the google map in photo area)

Easy Access to,
Government and Private Hospitals
Government and Private Banks
Government and International Schools
Super Markets

Electricity, Telephone and Pipe Water already available. All connections will be re-established by the seller.

Negotiable, All offers are welcome, and will sell to the right offer.
